body.name: Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Corded Handheld Vacuum Cleaner Mini Electric Broom for Pet Hair Hardwood Floor Cat Litter Carpet Cleaning (16ft-Cord)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 45 mins
features: Lightweight and small design stick vacuum cleaner , weighing less than 3 Ib, is extremely easy to use, and can be put into the desk drawer for storage after disassembly. It is a choice for pursuing easy housework.

Compared with the cordless vacuum of the same grade, the corded small vacuum cleaner with mini size but strong suction force has increased by 50% to 12000pa. Fine dust, pet hair, large particles such as cat litter can be easily handled , Brushless design eliminates the problem of entangled hair with a roller brush.
Specially designed 16ft length power cord ,can clean a room without frequent plugging and unplugging, thus reducing the trouble of frequent plugging and unplugging of corded vacuum cleaner.

The corded stick vacuum can be used by removing the pipe, equipping replacement crevice nozzle, converting to handy cleaner for continuous operation on all kinds of hardwood floors, short pile carpet and windowsills, sofa and bed, desk and curtain, etc.

9 mini multifunctional suction heads plus 1 flat suction configuration,a variety of usage methods are waiting for your excavation. Two filter element are configured to meet the demand of consumables for 6-12 months.

It is a choice for pursuing easy housework. Compared with the cordless vacuum of the same grade, the corded stick vacuum cleaner with small size but strong suction force has increased by 50% to 12000pa.Fine dust, hair, large particles such as cat litter can be easily handled , Brushless design eliminates the problem of entangled hair with a roller brush.BX-216 corded vacuum cleaner can be used by removing the pipe, equipping replacement crevice nozzle, converting to handy cleaner for continuous operation on all kinds of hardwood floors, short pile carpet and windowsills, sofa and bed, desk and curtain, etc.9 mini multifunctional suction heads plus 1 flat suction configuration,a variety of usage methods are waiting for your excavation. Two filter element are configured to meet the demand of consumables for 6-12 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Vacuum for the price
reviews.reviewText: Its lightweight and has plenty of suction for the size. The only problem I encountered was that the dirt cup keeps following off it you move the vacuum too fast. The fact that it comes with two hard filters is a great plus. The floor attachment is a little under powered but the needle nose attachment works better than my other vacuums costing much much more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, I bought the extra long cord, nice suction, easy to empty dust/dirt cylinder, container fills up quickly, pet fur. Heats up quickly, works pretty good for the price. Good selection of attachments, vacuum has a filter with a cover.It needs something to tie up the electrical cord

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this little vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I love this little vacuum. I have only 2 complaints. It doesn't have a place to wrap the cord up and it's suction is enough to "get by. "I bought it bc i left my big heavy one at a cleaning job. I didn't have a lot of money and i bought this one. Stairs are no problem.. it's so frigging light weight.It doesn't give you" vacuum lines"But it works.No one has complained about my vacuuming so far. Lol It's so easy to put together. It comes with 2 easy to clean filters.The cord is 26 fti think. The one i got. I think it's a decent size cord.No real complaints.I feel like it's worth it for the money i paid to be honest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great suction versatile, different attachments make it fit anywhere perfect lightweight definitely beat out my shark that was 10 times the price I want 10 more of these in one of my rooms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars LovED It! Then...
reviews.reviewText: When I received and started using the vacuum, it was absolutely wonderful with GREAT suction power and very easy to maneuver. I told my friends and family about it, especially those with cats as it was wonderful for picking up cat litter. However, about a month ago, the suction power just minimized and now I can't pick up a fuzzy on the floor, let alone any litter. I would love to get another one, hoping mine was just faulty, but I'm just not sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don't look any further. This little vac is powerful and easy to use. Don't spend a ton of money just buy this vac and get ready to be totally impressed. The accessories are awesome, will clean just like a high dollar vac but better. You will not be sorry with this gem for your hardwood floors and tile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and works well. My only disappointment is the short cord and that it does not sit upright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money!!
reviews.reviewText: This is great for using in my apartment on the tile floors! Easy to use, lightweight and love that you can wash the filter and reuse (hoping will extend the filter life) comes with extra filter and few attachments. I’ve only used on tile floor & area rug and it works really good. Long power cable so don’t have to keep changing outlets. Not sure it would be so good if home has a lot carpet but like I said it seems good for my area rugs. I’m a little ocd so when I empty out the cylinder I also empty out the filter and clean by rinsing with warm water after each use so I’m sure that helps - only takes a minute to do and drys out overnight. Really good value for money, so give it a try! :)
